additional_item_attributes.description: Käseaufschnitt²,¹⁰, Putenbrust, Butter, Frischkäse, Marmelade¹⁵, Tomate, Gurke, 1 gekochtes Ei & Brotkorb. Cheese slice²,¹⁰, turkey breast, butter, cream cheese, jam¹⁵, tomato, cucumber, 1 boiled egg & bread basket.
